articles.title: Josh Allen, Bills aren’t ready to give up the AFC East quite yet, and can the Patriots make the necessary corrections in Round 3?
articles.description:
What could have — and should have — been an emboldening, division-clinching win turned into a demoralizing loss for the Patriots, who had some flaws exposed, especially on defense.

articles.title: Rob Reiner, son of a comedy giant who became one in turn, dies at 78
articles.description:

articles.title: Police investigating apparent homicide in death of Rob Reiner, wife
articles.description:
Investigators believe they suffered stab wounds and a family member is being questioned, an official said.
